definitions.definition: Further along in the flow of current , in relation to a river, stream, bloodstream, or other flow of fluid.
Occurring later than something else; ( also, usually, especially ) influenced by something else; being a consequence of something else.
examples: Input validation is downstream of input entry in the runtime process.

subdefinitions.definition: In the direction from the server to the client .
Towards the 3′ end of a DNA molecule.

main_definition: Further along in the flow of current , in relation to a river, stream, bloodstream, or other flow of fluid.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Occurring later than something else; ( also, usually, especially ) influenced by something else; being a consequence of something else.
